data.description: Get the fundamentals of python programming from conditionals, loops, data structures, object-oriented programming, to web scraping and APIs.
Understand the common libraries for data analysis: numpy, scipy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn.
Learn how to work with SQL and NoSQL Databases, understand SQL Programming and how to integrate databases with python scripts.
Understand the math and statistics concepts for machine learning: calculus, linear algebra, optimization, inferential statistics, & probability.

Go through supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, understand how to use machine learning libraries like Scikit Learn for modeling and learn how to evaluate your models and optimize their accuracy/results.
Grasp a cloud computing platform such as Azure, AWS, Google Cloud, IBM Cloud, or Oracle Cloud to deploy your ML and AI  models.
Understand how to handle big data by learning Apache Spark or Apache Hadoop.
Learn how to use Git and Github for version control.
There’s no avoiding Excel in today’s corporate world and you should be well familiar with how to work with data on excel as on python data frames.
Learn other common tools for data manipulation such as Flare, PowerBI and Tableau.
Get the fundamentals of python programming from conditionals, loops, data structures, object-oriented programming, to web scraping and APIs.
Learn database management and how to work with SQL and NoSQL Databases.
Learn how to work with general application program interfaces and common REST APIs.
Learn libraries such as BeautifulSoup and Selenium for web data scraping and automation.
Learn how to build web applications with Python through a web framework such as Django or Flask.
Get technical into in graphical user development by learning frameworks such TKinter, Kivy, & PyQT.
Learn how to design and build data algorithms that fulfil the target functionality with optimal speed.
Build simple mobile apps with the Kivy Framework.
Learn how to build games with Python through frameworks such as PyGame, OpenGL, & PyGlet.
Manipulate, analyse and visualize data with python by learning scientific python through libraries such as Numpy, Scipy, Pandas, Matplotlib & Seaborn.
Get the fundamentals of python programming from conditionals, loops, data structures, object-oriented programming, to web scraping and APIs.
Understand the common libraries for data analysis: numpy, scipy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn.
Understand the math and statistics concepts for machine learning: calculus, linear algebra, optimization, inferential statistics, & probability.

Go through supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, understand how to use machine learning libraries like Scikit Learn for modeling and learn how to evaluate your models and optimize their accuracy/results.
Learn how neural networks work and python deep learning libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Theano, Keras among others.
Grasp a cloud computing platform such as Azure, AWS, Google Cloud, IBM Cloud, or Oracle Cloud to deploy your ML and AI  models.
Understand how to handle big data by learning Apache Spark or Apache Hadoop.
Learn how to use Git and Github for version control.
Learn how to design and build data algorithms that fulfil the target functionality with optimal speed.
Learn other common tools for data manipulation such as Flare, PowerBI and Tableau.
Build basic websites by learning HTML Markup, CSS Styling and Bootstrap.
Learn JavaScript and how it is used with HTML Pages for web design and interactivity.
Get the fundamentals of python programming from conditionals, loops, data structures, object-oriented programming, to web scraping and APIs.
Learn how to design and build data algorithms that fulfil the target functionality with optimal speed.
Learn database management and how to work with SQL and NoSQL Databases.
Build web applications with Python through the Django Framework.
Learn REST APIs through the Flask Framework.
Learn how to use Git and Github for version control.

Understand how to deploy your web applications on the cloud or web hosting by learning a cloud architecture such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud; web servers such as Apache and NGINX and finally container orchestration with Docker or NPM.
Learn React, Angular, or Vue frameworks for frontend design with JavaScript.
